body.en:
Today we would like to announce the release of 20/11 Manufacturing X. This release is packed with new, innovative topics marking a major milestone in our product portfolio. With this release, we further improve the user experience and efficiency of our customers in manufacturing industries.

All Test Systems will be upgraded to release 20/11 by 31 October 2020, and Production Systems by 14 November 2020. For the full release upgrade and patch schedule for 20/11 please visit our Support Site.

Download 20/11 Product Release

• Visual Product Finder - Spare parts are displayed as an image with hotspots representing the relevant parts which customers can add to the shopping cart.
  • Additional configuration - â€‹Enable/disable certain fields and rearrange the sequences of these fields in the Commerce UI. Custom tabs for additional views to load external application. 
  • Contact User list - Filter and multi-select users for mass changes of role, status or re-send invite emails.
  • More Flexibility for commerce pricing and order for customer specific requirements.

• New Configuration view was re-designed to guide users throughout the entire configuration process and assist them to shorten the sales configuration. 
  • Characteristics Visualization - Helps to connect users better with the product and configuration options at hand.  
  • Filter and View options are available in the UI workspace so that users can perform accurate and efficient sales configuration. 
  • Google Maps - Able to launch map for products where ''Enable Google Map" is available and set map to read-only. Both features are added to improve usability and discoverability. To improve readability of Google Maps, Custom text besides lines is also allowed.

• Opportunity Improvements - New features and fields are added to help sales representatives and managers to monitor sales cycles more effectively and make better informed decisions. 
  • Outlook Add-in - Use our plug-in to sync your contact data, email and calendar items to engage with your customers smoothly and efficiently.

Do you have any further questions? Reply to this email or contact your personal Customer Success Manager! You may also visit our blog for more information.

Download 20/11 Product Release
